games.name: New England Patriots at New York Jets

headlines.description: — Aaron Rodgers was in total control in a superb homecoming performance that kept the cheers and chants going from the giddy New York Jets fans.
headlines.shortLinkText: Rodgers sparkles in his first home start since his injury to lead Jets to 24-3 win over Patriots

games.name: New York Giants at Cleveland Browns

headlines.description: — There's one play that works better than all the others for the New York Giants: throw the ball anywhere in the vicinity of Malik Nabers.
headlines.shortLinkText: Rookie Malik Nabers catches 2 TD passes from Daniel Jones as Giants hold off banged-up Browns 21-15

games.name: Green Bay Packers at Tennessee Titans

headlines.description: — A change of scenery and an injury gave Malik Willis a huge opportunity to show what he can do in the NFL.
headlines.shortLinkText: Malik Willis shows the Titans what they gave up, leading the Packers to a 30-14 rout

headlines.description: — Jonathan Taylor used his sheer strength — and a nimble cut — to give the Indianapolis Colts the jump-start they needed Sunday.
headlines.shortLinkText: Colts rush for 3 TDs as struggling defense slows Bears offense for a 21-16 victory

headlines.description: — With the Minnesota Vikings savoring the unfamiliar vibe of being in full control in the fourth quarter, Justin Jefferson climbed on the bench to repeatedly wave his arms in encouragement of the...
headlines.shortLinkText: Vikings stay undefeated with 34-7 dismantling of Texans behind fierce defense, Darnold's 4 TDs

games.name: Philadelphia Eagles at New Orleans Saints

headlines.description: — Saquon Barkley and the Eagles emerged from a flood of Philadelphia-style scrutiny and delivered a masterclass on grinding out — and closing out — a physical, defensive struggle in which a lot went wrong before it ended just right.
headlines.shortLinkText: Saquon Barkley's 2 fourth-quarter TDs lift Eagles over Saints in a defensive 15-12 thriller

games.name: Los Angeles Chargers at Pittsburgh Steelers

headlines.shortLinkText: Justin Fields shines as the Steelers move to 3-0 with a 20-10 win over the Chargers

games.name: Denver Broncos at Tampa Bay Buccaneers

headlines.description: — Bo Nix's first NFL touchdown pass is still to come. For now, he and the Denver Broncos will settle for celebrating the rookie quarterback's first pro win.
headlines.shortLinkText: Nix runs for a TD and Lutz kicks 4 FGs to lead Broncos to 26-7 victory over listless Buccaneers

games.name: Carolina Panthers at Las Vegas Raiders

headlines.description: — Andy Dalton was supposed to be the veteran backup and mentor to Bryce Young, last year's No. 1 overall draft pick.
headlines.shortLinkText: Andy Dalton passes for 319 yards and 3 TDs to lead Panthers past Raiders 36-22 for first win

headlines.description: — Just three games into his tenure, Mike Macdonald has the Seattle Seahawks off to a perfect start and already with a two-game division lead.
headlines.shortLinkText: Seahawks roll to 24-3 win over Dolphins as Miami deals with another QB injury

headlines.description: — Lamar Jackson and the Baltimore Ravens had an early, emphatic answer for the first 0-2 start since before he was their franchise quarterback.
headlines.shortLinkText: Henry rushes for 151 yards, 2 TDs as Ravens hang on to beat Cowboys 28-25

games.name: San Francisco 49ers at Los Angeles Rams

headlines.description: — The winless Los Angeles Rams were fresh off a 31-point loss and missing their top two receivers when they took the field Sunday against a rival that has dominated them for a half-decade.
headlines.shortLinkText: The Rams rally from a double-digit deficit to stun the 49ers 27-24 on a late field goal

headlines.description: — Jared Goff looked as though he might never throw an incompletion for a while Sunday, picking apart the Arizona Cardinals' defense for a pair of touchdowns in the first half.
headlines.shortLinkText: Jared Goff throws 2 TD passes and Lions' defense slows Kyler Murray in 20-13 win over Cardinals

games.name: Kansas City Chiefs at Atlanta Falcons

headlines.description: — Patrick Mahomes knows he must get better.
headlines.shortLinkText: Mahomes throws 2 touchdown passes and the Chiefs' defense preserves a 22-17 win over the Falcons

headlines.description: — Any concerns Josh Allen had about how the Bills would perform following a 10-day break were eased during a 10-play opening drive that ended with James Cook scoring on a 6-yard touchdown run.
headlines.shortLinkText: Josh Allen throws 4 TD passes and the Bills roll to a 47-10 win over the unraveling Jaguars

headlines.description: — Jayden Daniels stood in the pocket against an all-out blitz, took a hit from Bengals safety Geno Stone and launched a perfect ball toward Terry McLaurin in the corner of the end zone. <a...
headlines.shortLinkText: Rookie Jayden Daniels nearly flawless for Commanders in 38-33 win over Bengals
